text: hahahah you incel this just proves you're a total snowflake. Triggered over a commercial telling men to be better? Obviously you're trash if you're offended by that commercial  #bigpussy
Or maybe it was on Harry's that I read that dollar shave club is made by Gillette. Fuck if I can remember

I think I actually read on the dollar shave club's website that one of their competitors was actually owned by Gillette. I can't can't remember for sure. I just did a real quick scan trying to find out and it seems that Gillette has all kinds of subsidiaries. I think a boycott of all their products would be in order, personally.

You got to be careful, some of these companies are actually Gillette selling under a different name. I don't remember which one it is. As a matter of fact, I was thinking that it would be I really good marketing ploy to do the bullshit that Gillette did and then come out with a different line of products under a different name but still made by them to sell to those of us he want to say fuck you.
